jpo
Class Jpo

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      jpo.Jpo
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, ApplicationMenuInterface, CleverJTreeInterface, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class Jpo
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements CleverJTreeInterface, ApplicationMenuInterface

Jpo is the the main class of a browser application that lets a user view a collection of pictures in as thumbnails, in a seperate window or in a full sized mode.

The Jpo class creates the following main objects:

It uses a list of pictures (PictureList file) to create a hirarchical model of SortableDefaultMutableTreeNodes that represent the structure of the collection. Each node has an associated object of GroupInfo or PictureInfo type. The CleverJTree visualises the model and allows the user to expand and collapse branches of the tree with the mouse. If a node is clicked this generates a valueChanged event from the model which is sent to all listening objects.

Listening objects are the thumbnail pane which displays the group if a node of type GroupInfo has been selected.

This listener architecture allows fairly easy expansion of the application since all that is required is that any additional objects that need to be change the picture or need to be informed of a change can connect to the model in this manner and need no other contorls.

Since:
JDK1.4.0
Version:
0.8
Author:
Richard Eigenmann, richard_eigenmann@compuserve.com
See Also:
CleverJTree, ThumbnailJScrollPane, PictureViewer, Serialized Form

Field Detail

cleverJTree

public CleverJTree cleverJTree
This object does all the tree work. It can load and save the nodes of the tree, listens to events happening on the tree and calls back with any actions that should be performed.

See Also:
CleverJTree

thumbnailJScrollPane

private ThumbnailJScrollPane thumbnailJScrollPane
This oject holds all the thumbnails and deals with all the thumbnail events.

Constructor Detail

Jpo

public Jpo()
Constructor for the Jpo application that creates the main JFrame, attaches an ApplicationJMenuBar, adds a JSplitPane to which it adds the CleverJTree on the left side and a ThumbnailJScrollPane on the right side.

Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
the main method is the entry point for this application (or any) Java application. No parameter passing is used in the Jpo application.

The method verifies that the user has the correct Java Virtual Machine (> 1.4.0) and then created a new Jpo object.

Brings up a QueryJFrame GUI.

Specified by:
find in interface CleverJTreeInterface
Parameters:

closeJpo

public void closeJpo()
method that is invoked when the Jpo application is to be closed. Checks if the main application window size should be saved and saves if nescessary. also checks for unsaved changes before closing the application.

requestOpenRecent

public void requestOpenRecent(int i)
Requests a recently loaded collection to be loaded. The index of which recently opened file to load is supplied from the ApplicationJMenuBar through the interface method ApplicationMenuInterface.requestOpenRecent(int).

Specified by:
requestOpenRecent in interface ApplicationMenuInterface
Parameters:
i - the index in the Settings.recentCollections array indicating the file to load.
